nodes.text: Osonu was a female Human lieutenant of the Galactic Republic during the Third Galactic War, who specialized as a grappler by 3626 BBY.

Osonu appears as a boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Onslaught expansion. Osonu only appears in the Imperial story, given that her role is replaced by Dogah in the Republic version of the story, who also functioned as a grappler.

In the Imperial storyline, Osonu, together with Republic soldiers Meinar and Corrik, fight the Commander, Darth Krovos, and Darth Rivix, when they land at the Dantooine Jedi Enclave to investigate the whereabouts of Darth Malgus. Osonu and both her companions are killed by the Commander's group.
